column3: sɛ ibetsie me nsɛm
column4: Na edze me mbrasɛm sie wo nkyɛn;"

column3: Dɛ edze w’akoma bɛma ntseasee;"
sɛ isu frɛ nhumu
column4: Na ema wo ndze do frɛ ntseasee;"

column3: Na ebɔr hwehwɛ no dɛ akoradze a ohuntsa a;"

column2: "Ɔno na ebɛtse Nyankopɔn no ho suro ase
column3: Na ehu Nyankopɔn no ho nyimdzee."

column2: "Osiandɛ EWURADZE na ɔma nyansa; N’anomu na nyimdzee na ntseasee fi ba:"

column3: Ɔyɛ kyɛm ma hɔn a wɔnantsew emudzi mu;"
Na ɔakora n’ahotseweefo kwan do."

column2: "Ɔno na ebɛtse ndzeyɛtsenenee na atsɛmbu ase. Nsɛntsenenee
column3: nyew
Na nyimdzee ayɛ wo kra fɛw;"
Ntseasee bɔkora wo do:"

column2: "Dɛ obeyi wo efi mbusu kwan mu
column3: Na nyimpa a wɔka nsɛm akɔntɔnkye ho;"
Na mbom wɔnantsew sum akwan mu;"

column2: "Hɔn a wɔbɔ mbusu no dzi ho ehurusi
column3: Na hɔn enyi gye mbusu akɔntɔnkyesɛm ho;"

column2: "Hɔn a wɔkyeakyea wɔ hɔn akwan mu
column3: Na wɔdandan hɔn akwan enyi:"

column2: "Dɛ obeyi wo efi ɔbaa sansanyi no ne nsamu
column3: Mekyerɛ ɔsansanyi a ɔka adɔkɔdɔkɔsɛm no ne nsamu."

column2: "Ɔno a ɔpa ne nkataasiaber mu kun
column3: Na no werɛ fir ne Nyankopɔn ahyɛmu:"

column2: "Na ne fi kom kɔ owu mu
column3: Na n’akwan kɔ ewufo mu:"
Eso wonnkodu nkwa akwan mu:"
Na eesie atseneneefo akwan."
Na hɔn a wodzi mu bɛka mu."
wobotwa hɔn efi asaase no do
column4: Na hɔn a wotwa nkontompɔ no
column5: wobotutu hɔn ase koraa efi do."
